task.title: Create an Administrative Team
task.shortdesc: Administrative teams provide supervisors with access to employees who do not report directly to them. The Administrative Teams page displays an alphabetical list of teams.

step.cmd: Select the start and end dates, if applicable. This time frame appears in the Validity Period column on the Administrative Teams page.

Select the team members from the Members field or enter the employee's name, or select Add All Employees. You can also use the Name Search field to search for a team or to find an employee. The teams listed were created in UltiPro based on supervisor and employee relationships. Check the Active as of Today box to display active employees in the search.
If necessary, you can remove an employee from a team. You are not prompted to confirm the removal.
